questions.question: Pipe A contains water and Pipe B contains a liquid of specific gravity 0.9. Manometric liquid is having specific gravity of 0.7. Find the pressure difference between pipe A and pipe B. Take h1 = 27 cm, h2 = 11 cm, hm = 11 cm
